title: ThinkAloud — The Gold Stack Manifest
description: An open constitution for decentralized AI infrastructure: compute, storage, connectivity, governance, data.

belief.statement: We believe in a resilient, decentralized, and intelligible intelligence stack. It is not inevitable; it is possible. We act on that possibility.

vision: Open, resilient, and sovereign intelligence infrastructure built by many, safe from collapse.
mission: Coordinate incentives, alignment, and growth across decentralized compute, storage, connectivity, governance, and data.

values.resilience: Prefer modular, repairable, fallback systems over brittle perfection.
values.clarity: Encode core commitments plainly; leave ambiguity where meaning demands it.
values.actionable: Include interfaces, triggers, and execution paths.

connectivity.description: Community wireless/LoRa for edge → AI fabric.
